body.p: The editors of the Journal of Early Childhood Research would like to thank the following reviewers who recently undertook reviews for the journal, in addition to members of our International Advisory Board:

Ansgar Allen, Kelly-Ann Baird, Jo Barker, Ian Barron, Tom Billington, Julia Bishop, Julie Brierley, Mary Briggs, Avril Brock, Liz Brooker, Pam Calder, Ann Clare, Sarah Cousins, Laura Dinehart, Hasina Ebrahim, Ersoy Erdemir, Peter Elfer, Lucy Galliard, Marika Gatt Sacco, Tricia Giardiello, Sue Gifford, Julia Gillen, Howard Goldstein, Usha Goswami, Felicity Grandjean, Colette Gray, Patricia Greenfield, Victor Groza, Elaine Hallet, Karen Hamilton, Andy Hancock, Georgia Herbet, Martin Hughes, Rosaleen Joyce, Lilian Katz, Susan Kingsley, Amy Lerner, Rachael Levy, Kay Margetts, Jackie Marsh, Nigel Marshall, Estelle Martin, Trish Maynard, Naomi McLeod, Sue Mifsud-Midola, Jools Page, Kate Pahl, Marina Papic, Elaine Reese, Sarah Rigden, Kathy Ring, Eve Sauer LeBarton, Maryellen Schaub, Christine Stephen, Kim Wailling, Li-Cheng Wang, Simon Warren, Su-Jeong Wee, Diane Wilkinson, Tony Williams, Dylan Yamada-Rice, Hyun-Kyung You, Susan Young,
